original_text: David was then in the stronghold, and the garrison of the Philistines was then at Bethlehem.
korean_text: 그 때에 다윗은 산성에 있고 블레셋 사람들의 진영은 베들레헴에 있는지라

sentences.original_text: David was then in the stronghold
and the garrison of the Philistines was then at Bethlehem
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 블레셋 사람들의 수비대는 그때 베들레헴에 있었다.
